message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $150. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $130 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the quality of this product is truly worth it. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still feel that $130 would be a fair price for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
